item.title: Abandoned rusty broken bikes, 16th October
item.description:
Bikes have been there for over 2 years. Obstructing the pavement and taking up space other bikes could use.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dynevor Road, Hackney, London

item.title: After bin collection rubbish all down road, 16th October
item.description:
Hello, How can we avoid litter in the roads from the recycling bags? Where all the recycling bags are pooled together it leaves a bunch of litter where the bags split. In Islington we had boxes and bins for recycling - no litter.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water pouring out of a hole in the road, 16th October
item.description:
A lot of water was pouring out of a hole in the road when I went down Humber Road this morning. And the same amount of water is pouring out when I came past after work this evening. See pictures, the water is rippling and going downhill.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, Humber Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disused wheelie bin, 16th October
item.description:
The wheelie bin has not been used or collected for almost two months and has been left on the pavement. It is encouraging other people to fill it with rubbish. Please can this be taken away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32,32A, Maylands Drive, Albany Park, Sidcup, London

item.title: Manhole Cover Banging, 16th October
item.description:
This one is a fairly new cover but due to the traffic volume it is banging again with heavy fast moving vehicles. I think it could be the tarmac wearing down or being compressed around it which is making the problem return. It’s the main central cover in the photo, opposite McDonald’s

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Kent Road, Old Kent Road, London
